description: Large body of water only traversable by boat or helicopter.
Forest that would be slow to travel by foot, impossible by car. Includes jungles.
Forest that would be relatively slow to travel by foot or car.
Land such as beaches, deserts, or other terrain that is walkable but time consuming.
Land that can be travelled by foot at a normal rate or by car at a faster rate.
Region containing mountains that will slow down  land travel, but can be bypassed by air vehicles.
